body:

If it's not a bug, please remove the template and elaborate the issue in your own words.
-->
This time in Linux connected to Windows session is giving an error message instead of exiting without any issues.

Steps to reproduce
------------------
In Linux PowerShell:
```powershell
maxt@orion:~$ powershell
PowerShell v6.0.0-beta.6
Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

PS /home/maxt> enter-pssession -HostName earth2 -UserName max_t                                                         
max_t@earth2's password: 
[earth2]: PS C:\Users\max_t\Documents> $PSVersionTable                                                                  

Name                           Value                                                                                   
----                           -----                                                                                   
PSVersion                      6.0.0-beta                                                                              
PSEdition                      Core                                                                                    
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-beta.6                                                                           
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.16275                                                            
Platform                       Win32NT                                                                                 
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}                                                                 
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3                                                                                     
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1                                                                                 
WSManStackVersion              3.0                                                                                     


[earth2]: PS C:\Users\max_t\Documents> exit                                                                             
The SSH transport process has abruptly terminated causing this remote session to break.
The SSH client session has ended with error message: The SSH transport process has abruptly terminated causing this 
remote session to break.
    + CategoryInfo          : ResourceUnavailable: (:) [], ParentContainsErrorRecordException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : System.Management.Automation.Remoting.PSRemotingDataStructureException

```

Expected behavior
-----------------
To exit PSSession without any error.

Actual behavior
---------------
Error message on exiting PSSession:
```
[earth2]: PS C:\Users\max_t\Documents> exit                                                                             
The SSH transport process has abruptly terminated causing this remote session to break.
The SSH client session has ended with error message: The SSH transport process has abruptly terminated causing this 
remote session to break.
    + CategoryInfo          : ResourceUnavailable: (:) [], ParentContainsErrorRecordException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : System.Management.Automation.Remoting.PSRemotingDataStructureException

```

Environment data
----------------
Windows 10 Insider Build 16257
Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS
Ssh

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
PS /home/maxt> $PSVersionTable                                                                                          

Name                           Value                                                                                   
----                           -----                                                                                   
PSVersion                      6.0.0-beta                                                                              
PSEdition                      Core                                                                                    
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-beta.6                                                                           
OS                             Linux 4.4.0-92-generic #115-Ubuntu SMP Thu Aug 10 09:04:33 UTC 2017                     
Platform                       Unix                                                                                    
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}                                                                 
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3                                                                                     
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1                                                                                 
WSManStackVersion              3.0  

```
